description: A validation tool that checks if a file size requires the use of change_applier tool. For large files exceeding the specified size threshold, the change_applier tool must be used instead of direct updates. This helps ensure proper handling of large files by enforcing the use of change_applier when necessary.

path.description: Path to the file to check size

size_threshold.description: Maximum file size in bytes before requiring change_applier (defaults to 6000)
